name: ai-commit-message
displayName: AI Commit Message Generator for VS Code
description: VS Code 插件：通过第三方 AI API（OpenAI、Azure、本地 LLM 等兼容接口）自动生成 Git Commit Message。A VS Code extension that generates Git commit messages via third-party AI APIs (OpenAI-compatible endpoints).

ai-commit-message.apiProvider.description: API Service Provider (openai, claude, azure, or custom endpoint)

ai-commit-message.apiUrl.description: API Base URL (default varies by provider: OpenAI: https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions, Claude: https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages, Azure: https://{resource-name}.openai.azure.com/openai/deployments/{deployment-id}/chat/completions)

ai-commit-message.model.description: Model Name (e.g. gpt-3.5-turbo for OpenAI, claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022 for Claude)

ai-commit-message.apiKey.description: [Optional] API Key (if not set, you'll be prompted at runtime)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
